articles.title: Inside Mirakl’s Agent Commerce Vision
articles.summary: Mirakl is pioneering "Agent Commerce", a revolutionary concept that leverages AI-powered agents to transform the e-commerce experience. These agents will enable personalized shopping, automated customer support, and streamlined supply chain management, redefining the way businesses interact with customers. By harnessing the power of AI, Mirakl aims to create a more efficient, intuitive, and customer-centric commerce ecosystem.

articles.title: Funding grants for new research into AI and mental health
articles.summary: Researchers have been awarded funding grants to explore the intersection of AI and mental health, aiming to develop innovative solutions for diagnosis, treatment, and support. This new research has the potential to revolutionize mental health care by leveraging AI's ability to analyze complex data and provide personalized interventions. The grants will enable scientists to investigate AI-driven approaches to improve mental well-being and address pressing issues in the field.

articles.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with the North American Aerospace Defense Command (NORAD) to enhance the "NORAD Tracks Santa" program, leveraging AI technology to bring a more interactive and immersive experience to children tracking Santa's journey on Christmas Eve. This collaboration aims to make the traditional holiday program more engaging and fun for kids worldwide. With OpenAI's innovative solutions, the program is expected to deliver a more magical and memorable experience.

articles.title: Accenture and OpenAI accelerate enterprise AI success
articles.summary: Accenture has partnered with OpenAI to help businesses accelerate their AI adoption and drive innovation. This collaboration aims to enable enterprises to harness the power of AI and achieve tangible results, from improved operational efficiency to enhanced customer experiences. By combining Accenture's industry expertise with OpenAI's cutting-edge technology, companies can unlock new opportunities for growth and transformation.

articles.title: OpenAI takes an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI adoption
articles.summary: OpenAI has taken an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings, a company that helps businesses implement AI solutions, to accelerate the adoption of enterprise AI. This partnership aims to simplify the integration of AI technologies into existing business systems, driving innovation and efficiency. By joining forces, OpenAI and Thrive Holdings can empower more companies to harness the power of AI and transform their operations.

articles.title: Transformers v5: Simple model definitions powering the AI ecosystem
articles.summary: The latest Transformers v5 release simplifies model definitions, making it easier for developers to integrate AI models into their applications. This update empowers the AI ecosystem by providing a more streamlined and accessible way to work with transformer models. By simplifying model definitions, Transformers v5 is poised to accelerate AI innovation and adoption across various industries.

articles.title: Diffusers welcomes FLUX-2
articles.summary: Diffusers has introduced FLUX-2, a significant update that enhances the capabilities of its AI-powered diffusion models. This new integration is expected to improve the quality and efficiency of image and data processing tasks. With FLUX-2, users can anticipate more accurate and detailed results from their diffusion-based applications.

articles.title: Continuous batching from first principles
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced a new approach to continuous batching, a technique that enables more efficient processing of data in artificial intelligence and machine learning models. This method, derived from first principles, aims to optimize batch processing and reduce latency, leading to improved performance and faster inference times. By rethinking the fundamentals of batching, this innovation has the potential to accelerate AI and ML workloads.

articles.title: 20x Faster TRL Fine-tuning with RapidFire AI
articles.summary: RapidFire AI has introduced a breakthrough technology that accelerates TRL (Transfer, Robustness, and Loss) fine-tuning by 20 times, enabling faster and more efficient model training. This innovation has the potential to revolutionize AI development by significantly reducing training times and increasing model accuracy. With RapidFire AI, researchers and developers can now fine-tune large language models at unprecedented speeds, opening up new possibilities for AI applications.

articles.title: Open ASR Leaderboard: Trends and Insights with New Multilingual & Long-Form Tracks
articles.summary: The Open ASR Leaderboard has introduced new multilingual and long-form tracks, enabling researchers to evaluate and improve automatic speech recognition (ASR) systems in diverse languages and longer audio recordings. This expansion provides valuable insights into ASR trends and advancements, driving innovation in voice technology. The updated leaderboard is expected to foster further breakthroughs in multilingual and long-form speech recognition capabilities.

articles.title: What will enter the public domain in 2026?
articles.summary: In 2026, works published in 1925 will enter the public domain, making classic literature, music, and films from that year freely accessible and usable without copyright restrictions. This includes notable works like F. Scott Fitzgerald's "The Great Gatsby" and Virginia Woolf's "Mrs. Dalloway". The public domain expansion will enable new creative adaptations, interpretations, and innovations based on these iconic works.

articles.title: DeepSeek-v3.2: Pushing the frontier of open large language models [pdf]
articles.summary: Researchers have released DeepSeek-v3.2, a cutting-edge open large language model that pushes the boundaries of natural language processing. This innovative model boasts improved performance and efficiency, making it a significant advancement in the field of AI. With its open-source availability, DeepSeek-v3.2 has the potential to accelerate progress in areas like language translation, text summarization, and conversational AI.

articles.title: Apple Releases Open Weights Video Model
articles.summary: Apple has released its Open Weights video model, a significant advancement in AI-powered video processing that allows for more efficient and accurate video analysis. This open-source model enables developers to build upon and improve video understanding capabilities, with potential applications in areas like video editing and content moderation. By making this technology available, Apple is driving innovation in the field of computer vision and AI-powered video processing.

articles.title: Arcee Trinity Mini: US-Trained Moe Model
articles.summary: The Arcee Trinity Mini is a new, US-trained moe model that generates anime-style characters, marking a significant advancement in AI-generated art. This model is notable for being trained on a Western dataset, differing from existing models that rely on Japanese datasets. The Arcee Trinity Mini has the potential to create more diverse and culturally nuanced anime-style characters.

articles.title: Google, Nvidia, and OpenAI
articles.summary: Google, Nvidia, and OpenAI are making significant advancements in AI technology, with Google focusing on large language models, Nvidia developing powerful GPUs to support AI processing, and OpenAI pushing the boundaries of natural language understanding. These innovations are poised to revolutionize industries such as healthcare, finance, and education. As a result, we can expect to see more intelligent and automated systems that transform the way we live and work.

articles.title: AI agents find $4.6M in blockchain smart contract exploits
articles.summary: AI-powered agents have discovered $4.6 million in potential exploits in blockchain smart contracts, highlighting the effectiveness of artificial intelligence in identifying vulnerabilities. This breakthrough demonstrates the potential for AI to improve blockchain security and prevent financial losses. By leveraging AI, developers can proactively identify and fix exploits, enhancing the overall security of decentralized networks.
